text: Jansug Charkviani (; 30 September 1931 â€“ 6 November 2017) was a Georgian poet. He was a member of the Parliament of Georgia from 1995 to 2003. He was born in Tbilisi. Charkviani graduated from the Tbilisi State University in 1953. He was awarded, among other prizes, the Shota Rustaveli Prize (1984), Georgia's Order of Honor, and the title of Honorary Citizen of Tbilisi (1996). Charkviani died on 6 November 2017 at the age of 86.Famous Georgian poet Jansug Charkviani passes away aged 86 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Poets from Georgia (country) Category:Members of the Parliament of Georgia Category:Writers from Tbilisi
title: Jansug Charkviani
